mapper.select:
select id as id, after_sales_no as afterSalesNo, buyer_shipping_no as buyerShippingNo, `type` as type, company_code as companyCode, company as company, `number` as number, shipping_money as shippingMoney, receiver as receiver, receiver_phone as receiverPhone, receiver_address as receiverAddress, created_time as createdTime, updated_time as updatedTime, status as status from mall_buyer_shipping where after_sales_no in
#{afterSalesNo}
